item.title: Connectiontypesbuyers: Guides
item.description: The guides <a href="/connectiontypesbuyers/hotel-x/howtos/guides/howto-connect-supplier/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-exchange"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Connect a New Supplier</h3> <p>How to connect to a new Supplier</p> </div> </div> </a> <a href="/connectiontypesbuyers/hotel-x/howtos/guides/certification_process/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-search-plus"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Certification process</h3> <p>Perform specific tasks</p> </div> </div> </a> <a href="/connectiontypesbuyers/hotel-x/howtos/guides/howto-book/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-check-square-o"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Useful information</h3> <p>Some concepts and particularities</p> </div> </div> </a>
